      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DevelopmentCard drawRandomDevCard()
      Draws a random dev card from the available cards in the bank This method removes the returned card from the bank when called.

      • setUpNewBank

        void setUpNewBank()
        Sets up new bank. This initializes the bank with the correct resource and development cards.
